Caption: German faculty members in their Convocation robes
Description: From left: Dr. F. W. Lohr, Dr. N. Klein, Dr. W. Koch, Dr. W. Lutz, Dr. H. Heitland, Dr. G. Stahl, Dr. W. Scheer, Dr. E. Hohmann and Dr. G. Rouve. The German professors played a key role in the initial stages of the development of IIT Madras.
